preference.name: IMM_SEARCH_MATREV_MATCHING_ATTR
preference.preference_description: Defines a customized list of Material Revision persistent attributes used to check how much in percentage it fits the selected filter. * Each entry in this list should be like follow: RealNameOfPersistentAttr;bool or RealNameOfPersistentAttr;lov * Each entry in this list could have a Display name by concatenating it, at the beginning, with a '#' separator like follow: DisplayName#RealNameOfPersistentAttr;bool
